name: Richard Williams
text: Order on their app. The delivery time was 25 to 35 minutes. I finally called at one hour and was told delivery person was on way but had 4 others orders also. I received order 75 min after I ordered and was cold as driver did not have in a …More

name: Horrible Really disappointed
text: Elizabeth the manager on duty , told us she wasn’t going to help us & hung up. After we received our pizza an hour late , without half of the order. This is the worst Pizza Hut I’ve ever ordered from. I know you can expect much , but she should be fired instantly. I will drive miles further to not deal with the trash that works there.

name: deborah singer
text: I went to the Telegraph pizza location yesterday and the people were rude. You would think that since there has been a pandemic they would be grateful for the business but not everyone gets food out all the time and knows the procedures for …More

name: Ben Albritton
text: The counter person was great. She checked to make sure everything was right,  explained the price  and checked again to make sure we were satisfied with everything. The pizza is great. Couldn't ask for more.

name: Cristal Calvillo
text: Someone just tested positive for the corona virus and the managers are so unprofessional they didn’t let all the staff only some know they have been exposed . Very rude of the managers to put the costumers and their employees well being in risk .

name: Bigis
text: Horrible service delivery guy came to my door asking me what plans do I have tonight I gave birth last week my husband is over the road he kept coming up to me I got scared and slammed the doors called Pizza Hut back they said they can’t do nothing about it.  NEVER ORDERING FROM THIS PLACE AGAIN.

name: Brian Meyers
text: They are very good to me at this location!! Always great

name: steve cooper
text: People complain about delivery times, you have to understand how delivery works. You order online will say 30 minutes it's never right it's not there fault there are 30 deliveries to take and only 5 drivers max! So ya it's going to be a …More

name: Roxie Stitt
text: Didn't get what I ordered what was brought wasn't what was in my phone I ordered from didn't get napkins or crushed peppers or parmesan and OR A Receipt.!! when I called to complain the mngr on duty told me sorry they brought what I ordered …More

name: Don Coaley
text: Horrific hygiene here. Came in to pick up my order and watched the line cook prepping pizzas with no gloves, then use a broom or mop in the area, then go right back to using the unwashed and ungloved hands to make pizzas, gripping crusts …More

name: Jimbo Lesser
text:
LOL!!!   Called to place an order. Can I put you on hold - she said.
I said OK. 5 minutes later the wife said hang up and call back.
I said, No I will lose my place in line. Wife called on her phone. …More

name: Karen Lada
text: Store messed up our order, manager told me it was my fault and she couldn’t poop out another pizza and have it magically appear. I will be calling corporate

name: Justin Thompson
text: I ordered a pizza on labor day, I understand it's a holiday, but I live like 2mins away from this pizza hut. I ordered the pizza online at 12:37pm got an email saying it would arrive at 1:28pm (which I was fine with). The pizza didn't get …More

name: Deanna Sanchez
text: Fast service & pizza was great!

name: Cara Buckhaulter
text: Do not order delivery from the Telegraph location.  We ordered for delivery and were given a delivery time approx 30 minutes following the order.  We waited for over 1 hour and then called the store and were told it would be another hour, …More

name: Jennifer Shaw
text: Terrible customer service! Called to order 15 pizzas last minute for my nephews 1st birthday party. The lady on the phone said um we need more time for an order that big (which was 2 hours before I needed them). Really? I'm sure you make …More

name: Jessica Brown
text: Used my gift card and then put the remaining balance on my debit card. All went through online and even my confirmation came in. Then I got a call that the card didn't work so they charged it all to my card. Well I only ordered because I …More

name: Ken Beaty
text: Customer service was downright rude. You only have one chance to make a good first impression.

name: Derek Larger
text: I see a lot of people say this place is bad. But I've always had great experiences pizza. Food is always hot, is usually here in 20 minutes or less.

name: Kawthar Albasha
text: I ordered online for delivery and got my pizza after an hour and a half, it was cold and was missing the garlic dip that I ordered and paid for.

name: Jason Frank
text: I will no longer visit here with my children.  I herd around  that a regestered sex offender by the Name of Jeff works here, I will not be visiting this location again.

name: Britni Carignan
text: New fresh faces in this place and it seems the problems of the past are in the past. Took a chance ordering from here since it's just across the road and wasn't disappointed. Driver was polite and my food was hot and delicious.

name: Mike Dempsey
text: Customer service is horrible! Food comes out wrong all the time. 50min to 70min delivery times all the time! $3.00 delivery charge which is also taxed on your order.  Management is not very helpful. If i ordered here 100 times in 8 years, i …More

name: Steven Edwards
text: Rarely will you get 2 decent pizzas in a row, ordered at different dates. I've never experienced inconsistency more than this location. The bad thing about locations is, you're stuck with the Pizza Hut in that zipcode. I really enjoy their …More

name: Josh Nodurft
text: Everytime I order my food it is on time for pick up. I don't normally do delivery because I like to get the feel of the enviroment inside the establishment. All the employees here are friendly and extremely compliant.

name: Rick Ulozas
text: Always had great experience and food was always hot and fresh

name: Terri Case
text: Very good pizza, pasta & hotwings.

name: Ashley Parks
text: Cannot understand why this store is still open. Ordered online with a 30 minute delivery window. After 50 minutes, tried calling the store. The phone rang for 5 full minutes with no answer. The last time we tried to order, they told us it was a 2 hour wait. At 4:30pm on a Sunday? This isn't NYC. Ridiculous.

name: Su Am
text: The old woman serving yesterday at around noon time was cranky, grumpy&rude.

name: Brenda Johnston
text: Fast.

name: Maryann Houston
text: Love there pizza

name: Alexis Grace
text: Never and I mean never order delivery from this store, I usually never have an issue but this time I put in an order for an 8 piece boneless wing and it's been 3 hours and I've yet to receive it, I've also been on the phone for an hour and I've been hung up on three different times.

name: Lauren Slavik
text: It's honestly hit or miss. If it wasn't the nearest one I wouldn't bother.
